content: Hi, Is there a good example of StructureMap so we can understand its usage, the only example provided does not give any detail about the usability?

From the example I would want to see how it is used , I could understand the alternative way of doing this by using dynamic value with the examples provided. I would want to understand the same by using structuremap for which there is no example...
We are working on example transformations for the specific categories that are defined for ActivityDefinition. Those will be posted to the build as soon as we have them.
